page.title: 14Steeple Claydon - Clubs
page.content: There are about 30 clubs in the area, supported by 50% of the population.Football and cricket take place on the{Recreation Ground}of about 7 1/2 acres.Others take place in {non purpose-built premises.}Scouts, Guides,Keep-fit,Badminton,Short Tennis,Women's Institute and Play Groups use either the{Old School}or {Village Hall.}Other smaller clubs meet in the small{Labour Hall}or private houses.{Fishing}is available and very popular.There is a very active{swimming club}which uses the school's outdoor,heated pool for about 4 months and run a coach to a pool in Brackley in winter.25% of the population{keep fit}by walking,jogging and cycling.33% attend recreation clubs away from the village mainly for tennis,swimming,sailing and Adult Education.
